messages.content: "Only I can beat the Conservatives here"
The election here in Altrincham and Sale West is between me and the Conservative candidate. Just look at the result here last time.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit from damaging jobs and opportunity in Trafford.
Fighting for more money for all of our local schools.
Having an office available for constituents to visit their MP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election here in Altrincham and Sale West is between me and the Conservative candidate. Just look at the result here last time.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservative MP has supported a hard Brexit for years and I know he doesn’t share the values of the people of Altrincham and Sale West.
issues.education: Fighting for more money for all of our local schools.

quotes.text: The election here in Altrincham and Sale West is between me and the Conservative candidate. Just look at the result here last time.

The Conservative MP has supported a hard Brexit for years and I know he doesn’t share the values of the people of Altrincham and Sale West. He’s voted against same sex marriage and in favour of fox hunting. Those views do not represent voters round here.
I hope people make their vote count this time and back an MP Trafford can be proud of.

examples: The Euro election result from May 2017
